REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2518 reute d f BC-GE-<GE>-GETS-30.0-MLN 04-09 0039

TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> GETS 30.0 MLN DLR F-111 RADAR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: General Electric Corp has received a 30.0 mln dlr contract for lot three of attack radar sets for the F/FB-111 avionics modernization program, the Air Force said. reuter
